title: docs build failures with Sphinx v4
body:
As mentioned in gh-5649, the docs builds on maint and master are failing with the recently released Sphinx v4.

The failure on maint is due to a new warning:

```
2021-05-10T13:39:13.8613027Z Warning, treated as error:
2021-05-10T13:39:13.8616407Z /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/site-packages/datalad/support/constraints.py:docstring of datalad.support.constraints.EnsureChoice:1:duplicate object description of datalad.support.constraints.EnsureChoice, other instance in generated/datalad.plugin.add_readme, use :noindex: for one of them
```

https://github.com/datalad/datalad/runs/2546087330

The failure on master is triggered by an exception:

```
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8471475Z Exception occurred:
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8473341Z   File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/inspect.py", line 2396, in _signature_from_callable
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8475171Z     raise ValueError('callable {!r} is not supported by signature'.format(obj))
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8475953Z ValueError: callable operator.itemgetter(0) is not supported by signature
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8477103Z The full traceback has been saved in /tmp/sphinx-err-3s4dwe4_.log, if you want to report the issue to the developers.
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8478144Z Please also report this if it was a user error, so that a better error message can be provided next time.
2021-05-10T13:44:31.8479379Z A bug report can be filed in the tracker at <https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/issues>. Thanks!
```

https://github.com/datalad/datalad/runs/2546133329
